mapper.select: select cp_id, salt from tb_compsecurity where cp_id = #{cp_Id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_company (cp_num, cp_Id, cp_Pw, cp_Name, cp_Ceo, cp_Add, cp_Bnum, cp_Bank, cp_Account, cp_Email, cp_Phone, cp_Date, cp_State, cp_Joinstate, cp_Outdate) values (tb_company_seq.nextval, #{cp_Id}, #{cp_Pw}, #{cp_Name}, #{cp_Ceo}, #{cp_Add}, #{cp_Bnum}, #{cp_Bank}, #{cp_Account}, #{cp_Email}, #{cp_Phone},sysdate, '0', '0', null)
mapper.update: update tb_company set cp_Pw = #{cp_Pw}, cp_account=#{cp_Account}, cp_bank=#{cp_Bank}, cp_phone=#{cp_Phone}, cp_email=#{cp_Email} where cp_Id=#{cp_Id}
mapper.select: select * from tb_reserv where sp_num in (select sp_num from tb_space s, tb_company c where s.cp_num = ${cp_Num} ) order by sp_num
